name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kylank, gormster, BoscoStacy, farqussus, shades, morbo)

name: cashprizes
text: TA-DAAH!

name: c_dizzle
text:
i think it's even better as it looks: with everyone posing in complete and utter silence after pat pulls the curtain back.

also: your avatar speaks like a poem.

name: bitteravatar
text: Roast Beef looks so unsure of himself in the shower I bet Ray put him up to this.

name: bookofsand
text: It looks to me more like Beef is pleading for forgiveness: "Pat, I am so sorry that I ragged on your awesome hat."

name: geysershitdick
text: I love this strip but I don't know why. Someone please explain it to me.

name: rapid_roy
text: it's because pork pie hats are awesome

name: farqussus
text: six hundred ska bands can't be wrong!

name: rowboat
text: Six hundred ska bands must, by nature's unalterable laws, be wrong at least six hundred times.

name: farqussus
text: you are a dude who understands

name: gmm
text: This is the ultimate truth

name: capnroblivious
text: Chubby'd.  And I like ska, you bastard.  So that really hurt me to admit.

name: dusty
text: Did you take into account the possibility that some of the ska bands may have formed on accident?

name: farqussus
text: One can only hope

name: soticoto
text: I'ma write a paper on the natural flocculation of Ska bands.

name: bixschmix
text: Pork pie hats with jaunty bows!

name: spinynorman
text: All bows have always stuck me as pretty jaunty, IMO

name: spinynorman
text:
EVIDENCE:

[IMGS OFF]

[IMGS OFF]

[IMGS OFF]

name: spinynorman
text:
wait I got confused between pork pie hats and bow ties halfway through

Still, jaunty as fuck

name: farqussus
text: that second one.. not so jaunty.

name: spinynorman
text: Brother Mouzone is still mighty jaunty with a pistol.

name: farqussus
text: I guess he is in colour despite his surroundings. That's not shabby.

name: scraggg
text:
Before reading this comment, it was my fondest hope that that was a picture of D'Angelo Barksdale from the future.
I've yet to finish the first season, y'see.

name: choosebro
text: Watched the rest of it yet? Did you like it?

name: morbo
text: nobody has ever not liked it.

name: radarjammer
text: Ummm... Tom Waits isn't wearing a bow.

name: steerpike66
text: My God. Fry and Laurie as Jeeves and Wooster. Greatest casting decision in the history of creation.

name: libelandslander
text:
Looking at that top picture, these were my internal monologues exact words:
"Is that Hugh Laurie? It's not Hugh Laurie... no! That is definitely Hugh Laurie."

I now hope that I get to use the phrase "That is definitely Hugh Laurie" in conversation.

name: choosebro
text:
I feel sorry for your Americans. Your own knowledge of the awesomeness that is Laurie comes from his role in House.

It's 2 months since your comment, so I'm hoping that you have gone and looked up some of his other stuff.

name: libelandslander
text:
I have seen sprinklings.
Not enough though... though I don't know if there is an amount of Hugh Laurie that is enough.

name: spinynorman
text:
I own all of A Bit of Fry and Laurie on DVD.

Though that's a bit predictable.

name: spinynorman
text:
Also Jeeves and Wooster.

Again, predictable.

name: choosebro
text: Torrents are your friends, my Fryed colleague. It's pretty easy to get both those things and the entirety of QI (which features Hugh Laurie in the debut episode.) It may interest you that Mr Fry appeared on Never mind the Buzzcocks (the music panel show) a couple of days ago as a team captain. I suggest that you look it up.

name: hellofditties
text: That episode what hilarious.  The intros round?  Hilarious.

name: hellofditties
text: Was.  Was.  Yeah, I can make sense.

name: katal
text: A comment left by katal was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kylank, waitwhat, SenseiHollywood)

name: spectre
text: Which is why Roast Beef ended up burying the black shirt Molly gave him -- he was expecting to get the same treatment.

name: cousinted
text: Just imagine Pat slowly pulling away the shower curtain. Beef and Ray remain frozen in that exact position the entire time

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Last panel KILLS!

name: geysershitdick
text: A comment left by geysershitdick was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by phthoggos, Sakana, kylank, LordPretzel)

name: closefriend
text: I figured they were dancing like they were in a jazz bar to mock him.

name: riazm
text: This is EXACTLY what I visualise.

name: diggidy
text: Thank you for placing a delightful image in front of my brain-eyes.

name: iguessso
text: i am pretty sure they snuck in there just to bother him about his new hat

name: chaesar
text: Panel 6 sound effect: loud cymbal splash

name: hellofyellin
text: Panel 7: Cut to a sepia-toned shot of a cigar butt smouldering in an ashtray.  Fin.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: A comment left by everything_is_a_hat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by phthoggos, kylank, le_chien_manquee, aHatOfPig, mattylite)

name: semiquaver
text: You have such an appropriate handle.

name: heccibiggs
text: I can't help but find your confusion completely hilarious.

name: waitwhat
text: This strip makes me wish that i had a friend named Pat, to whom i could shout randomly, "Is caviar pretty good stuff Pat?"

name: al_batross
text:
sans question mark
no

name: lacrimus
text: Alt Text: We are interested in your adoptable dog.

name: mystkmanat
text: That is the best kind of dog.

name: phthoggos
text: Damn, what a team.

name: nurdbot
text: I really hope they bring that hat back at some point.

name: sargasm
text: Ray did.  He pretended to be mocking Pat here, but he wore a porkpie hat for the GOF.

name: spectre
text: Because that is what "Rodney Leonard Stubbs" wore -- he copied his Dad, not Pat!

name: overmedicated
text: That was more of a banded trilby, wasn't it?

name: saddestking
text: I saw a banded trilby on safari once.  Put up a hell of a fight.

name: scramblesthedog
text: It has made the occasional reappearance.

name: cuddlefish
text: full scale sass

name: djwhiterabbit
text: ah, back in the days before the cats' mouths moved when they talked.

name: red_dawn
text:
Beef and Ray are hella committed to mocking Pat's
hat.

name: philosophe
text: They may even be hell of commited. You never know.

name: nabeel84
text: I don't know, Roast Beef is just a sidekick to Ray in this one. When Roast Beef actually wants to rag on someone, he dominates like no other. " Your activities are so poorly conveyed ."

name: achewoodno1fan
text: i thought they wre sincere.. and roast beefs feelings are hurt..

name: centipede_damascus
text:
See, I think they look pretty apologetic in the last panel. Like they are saying "We are sorry about making fun of your hat Pat! Look, we'll wear hats too!"

I don't really understand the confusion here.

name: never_die
text: they is just a couple of fools who is all taking a joke too fars.

name: mike24
text: roast beef is happy, this makes me happy.

name: nathanielperson
text: I think this is the first appearance of the angry Pat we all know and hate.

name: m3funkyb
text: pat has borderline personality disorder

name: farqussus
text: He thinks he's a borderline?

name: aperson
text:
When in fact he's a bordehat.
-chico.

name: tetrisattack
text: If anyone can find me that kind of hat online I will be forever grateful to them.

name: jackparsons
text: "Pork Pie" - usenzie der Google

name: heccibiggs
text: I take my gratitude in the form of money.

name: spectre
text: A comment left by spectre was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by seven47, phthoggos, Overmedicated, tetrisattack)

name: shoinan
text: This strip kinda explains Pat.

name: philosophe
text: Oh man, I just noticed that RB is smoking in the shower. For some reason, that just makes the strip. From a 4 to a 5.

name: alessandro
text: this is one of my fav strips.

name: deusoma
text: I just love the idea that they'd buy hats they find stupid and break into a friend's house just to make fun of him. Easy 5.

name: astro_zombie
text: Not to mention the fact that they probably stood in that position for hours waiting.

name: scorpion13
text: Yep. Thats pretty much Defcon 1 level ball-breaking right there.

name: thegrayhoodie
text: Call me crazy, but this is my favorite Achewood strip.  The last panel kills me.  You just KNOW they went out and purchased those hats to mess with Pat.

name: aplomb
text: Check out Ray rubbing his belly while asking about caviar. Took me many many reads to spot that.

name: stuart
text: Discovery: more than a Daft Punk album.

name: rateoforange
text: I have this strip hanging in my bathroom next to the shower.

name: miked
text: guarantee Ray is making that Cartman "Chaaaa!!" noise in the last panel..

name: stuart
text: Imagine that third-panel Pat is a really tall ghost.

name: missbee
text: That's what I thought too! The curtain lines up just right

name: catshirt
text: when does roast beef not look unsure of himself in a shower.

name: doomsdaybadger
text: Ever since I read this comic everytime I go to take a shower I expect to find my friends wearing the same hat as me, and striking a pose.

name: hendetta
text: Before I thought more about this I imgained it as Ray and Beef being caught thinking pork pie hats were cool in Pat's shower.

name: snowman
text: they are giving him the business

name: sharparcher01
text: the best part is that they are in mid-swagger

name: 21echoes
text: Beef's face in the last frame is what makes it for me every time. He looks legitimately concerned in some way.

name: wonelove
text: this is how I make fun of my friends when they wear funny hats

name: st-elmos_fire
text: I am of the belief that the effort they put into mocking his had indicates they secretly admire Pat's hat wearing decisions.

name: tragicone
text: a bodi-oh-do

name: lightlytoasted
text: I wish I owned a hat that fancy
